analysis:
**1. The Core Claim(s):**
The claim asserts that Donald Trump is currently the president of the United States.

**2. <hl>Evidence Breakdown:**
*   According to Wikipedia and USAGov, Donald Trump is the 47th and current president of the United States</hl>.
<hl>*   He was sworn into office on January 20, 2025</hl>.
<hl>*   Donald Trump also served as the 45th president of the United States from 2017 to 2021</hl>.

**3. Context & Nuance:**
The information available confirms that Donald Trump is currently serving as the 47th president of the United States, having been sworn in on January 20, 2025. He also previously served as the 45th president.

**4. Red Flags & Discrepancies:**
No major discrepancies found in the verified sources.

grounding_citations.title: President of the United States - Wikipedia
grounding_citations.snippet: In addition, nine vice presidents have become president by virtue of a president's intra-term death or resignation. In all, 45 individuals have served, or are serving, 47 presidencies as of the current 60th four-year term. Donald Trump is the 47th and current president since January 20, 2025. Contents ... The members of Congress elected a president of the United States in Congress Assembled to preside over its deliberation as a neutral discussion moderator. Unrelated to and quite dissimilar from the later office of president of the United States, it was a largely ceremonial position with no executive powers other than presiding over a parliamentary body. In 1783, the Treaty of Paris secured independence for each of the former colonies. With peace at hand, the states each turned toward their own internal affairs.

grounding_citations.title: Donald Trump - Wikipedia
grounding_citations.snippet: Donald John Trump (born June 14, 1946) is an American politician, media personality, and businessman who is the 47th president of the United States. A member of the Republican Party, he served as the 45th president from 2017 to 2021. Donald Trump. Head-and-shoulders shot of Trump with a serious facial expression, his right · Official portrait, 2025. 45th & 47th President of the United ... In 1996, he purchased the Miss Universe pageants, including Miss USA and Miss Teen USA. Due to disagreements with CBS about scheduling, he took both pageants to NBC in 2002. In 2007, he received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame for his work as producer of Miss Universe. NBC and Univision dropped the pageants in ...

grounding_citations.title: Presidents, vice presidents, and first ladies - USAGov
grounding_citations.snippet: (2025-09-17) The 47th and current president of the United States is Donald John Trump. He was sworn into office on January 20, 2025.

grounding_citations.title: Donald J. Trump - The White House
grounding_citations.snippet: Trump is the 45th President of the United States. He believes the United States has incredible potential and will go on to exceed even its remarkable achievements of the past.
